column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I could go on and on describing the ever changing institute but it's almost like a fiction story "Hey
column2: did you get a chance to see the Munch exhibit" or "How cool was the Taoism and Arts of China Exhibition". It's almost unbelievable how they are such a revolving door of culture and history. I think it's funny when people ask what kind of art lover am I... Contemporary
column5: and so on. As if you could just pick one!! There are pieces that I love from each genre
column6: like how can you not love Picasso's blue period
column7: or the warped mind of Dali
column8: and the detail of Albright. So much to choose from and now even more with the new modern addition. Check it out
column9: it's like a whole new area to play in!
